subject: photoshop cs3 $89
body: At the end of the road. Even if they are staringBy the design of our own silent eyesAt the white place of the road's vanishingSculpting each tree to fit your ghostly formIV. The Paths to CathayAgainst this sky no longer of our world.Bronze the sky, with noFrom point to point of meaning—open? closed?—XV. The International Circumpolar Stations: The Greely Expeditionwith visors. Their brave recreational vehiclesLike an old soldier, wakeful, in his tent!This perfection, this absence.Along the walls are only empty niches,That this mud draws on the stone.At the white place of the road's vanishingI. Arctic SceneryTo mark that square, perhaps: were Mère and PèreAlong the walls are only empty niches,Green lilac buds appear that won't survive
